alert.note: Alert for Dillon (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dillon County through 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bingham, or near Dillon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Latta, Floydale, Hamer, Oak Grove, Little Rock and Mcleod Medical Center. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 180 and 196. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
